body:
Trying to build `petsc@3.13.0` using gcc@7.3.0 fails on x86_64 for:
* Ubuntu 18.04
* RHEL 7, RHEL 8

Using `spack@develop`, commit `b6b44948b86` from Wed, Apr 29, 2020.

It is failing during configure phase with the following message:
```
*******************************************************************************
         UNABLE to CONFIGURE with GIVEN OPTIONS    (see configure.log for details):
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--with-hdf5-dir=/opt/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/hdf5-1.10.6-fmakhotquabwy24zyn4kfzi53mtlsl3l did not work
*******************************************************************************
```

[configure.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4553113/configure.log)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4553114/spack-build-out.txt)


@balay @germasch @BarrySmith @jedbrown
